name: Demonic Breadsticks
description: Breadsticks bathed in garlic and butter, sprinkled with the finest cheese from hell.

name: Underworld Wings
description: Chicken wings marinated in a fiery sauce, smoky and spicy.

name: Coca-Cola
description: Enjoy the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola.

name: Diet Coke
description: Crisp, refreshing, and zero calories, Diet Coke is a guilt-free choice.

name: Forbidden Fruit
description: An enchanted apple pie, a taste so divine, it must be forbidden.

name: Hellfire Hot Chocolate
description: A decadently rich hot chocolate with a fiery hint of chilli.

name: Satan's Sundae
description: A devilishly good sundae, layered with dark chocolate and chili-infused cherries.

name: Eternal Damnation Donuts
description: Deep-fried donuts glazed with a sinfully sweet cinnamon and sugar coating.

name: Purgatory Pudding
description: A heavenly bread pudding with a dark, caramel drizzle.
